channel.title: Dance & Music on Naresh Chaurasia
channel.description: Recent content in Dance & Music on Naresh Chaurasia

item.title: Bachata
item.description: Bachata Bachata Pooja Rishab Bachata Routines Shine with Bachata Shines Petra Mohamed Bachata - Incognito Dance Bachata Bachata Pooja Rishab Drama on the Dance Floor (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=20w1tTdoGSU) PR Routine (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2RGjAL3UH2Y) On the Spot, and Rotation in close hold Side Basic Vertical Basic Diagonal Basic, Hammer Lock 1, Hammer Lock 2, Wrap and Wave, Wrap and Comb, Cream Routine, Wrap, n Left Right, Double Hand Turn, Double Hand Trun with Flick 180 degress, 3 types Saturday: Side Basic, In Place / On Spot Basic, Front/Vertical Basic (with Resistance), Right Turn, Left Turn, Step and Touch, Right Turn + Left Turn, Double Hand Turn, Double Hand Turn (comb), Double Hand Turn (flick), Come in Close Hold (Basic & Advanced), How to give resistance.

item.title: Dancing with ChatGPT
item.description: Dancing with ChatGPT I really seriously want to become a very good dancer. Please suggest me how I can become a very good dancer. Becoming a good dancer requires dedication, practice, and a strong passion for the art form. Here are some suggestions to help you on your journey to becoming a very good dancer: Choose a dance style: Decide on the dance style that you’re most interested in or passionate about.

item.title: Kizomba
item.description: Kozomba on Fire Kizomba Steps Kozomba on Fire Difference Between Taraxa and Kizomba So taraxa is slow movements the wave movements that lady moving the hips. And when you are very slowly dancing with your lady or with your partner because the music is smooth there are not many strong beats. Taraxa - Wave and Double Time I will be like these feet apart. Relax. One man one hand on the belly another on the back.

item.title: Dance
item.description: Daily Dance Routine Jan 2023 Dance Challenge Dance Challenge - May 2022 Dance Improvement - May 2022 Exercise / Stretching Daily Dance Routine Jan 2023 Warm Up 1 Like Woh Woh (Swag + Running Man) Salsa 8s Salsa 8s (Blindfolded) Bachata Hip Movements Dance Challenge Target to finish one challenge per week. By the end of 2 months you will have lot of skills up your sleeve. Dance Challenge - May 2022 Dance Improvement - May 2022 Body Wave

item.title: Salsa
item.description: Salsa Salsa Shines Routine Salsa Dance Routine Seaon Stylist Bristol Section 1: Hour One Section 2: Hour Two Section 3 Steps YouTube Salsa Salsa Routine Brijendra Etana Routine Pune Salsa Routine (men’s left turn, men’s right trun) Dance Papi: The Half Moon Turn for Ladies Dance Papi: The Basic Copa Salsa Drop Salsa Shines & Basic Routine 2 to 3 songs, when salsa hits me.
